Home_screen_H1_label: Cleanliness with Comfort: Household Chemicals from
Home_screen_H2_label: Discover a world of impeccable cleanliness and freshness with our effective range of home products.
Product_screen_title_part1: Impeccable Care for Your Home: Explore our
Product_screen_label: From elegant cleanliness to effective care: Find perfect solutions for every corner of your home in our catalog.
Little_soap_malina: Liquid cream soap with Raspberry extract
Little_soap_malina_text: Gentle and refreshing liquid soap for everyday use with a pleasant raspberry aroma. Our unique formula contains a blend of gentle active components that create a rich lather and effectively remove impurities. It includes water, sodium laureth sulfate for lathering, sodium chloride for stable consistency, cocamidopropyl betaine and cocamide DEA for gentle cleansing, citric acid for optimal pH, raspberry-scented perfume for a delightful mood, methylchloroisothiazolinone and methylisothiazolinone for long-lasting freshness, xanthan gum for stabilization, and CI 16255 dye for a vibrant raspberry hue.
Little_soap_aloe: Liquid cream soap with Aloe extract
Little_soap_aloe_text: Gentle and refreshing liquid soap with the scent of aloe vera for everyday use. Little_dishwashing_lemon_text: Our incredible daily dishwashing solution is not only effective but also specially designed for your convenience and satisfaction. Its secret lies in an enhanced formula that combines the best components to provide long-lasting foam and quality cleaning. This solution contains a unique blend of effective anionic, non-ionic, and amphoteric surfactants responsible for stable foam and refined cleansing. Moreover, it's enriched with glycerin and extracts, aimed at caring for your skin during dishwashing. This marvelous product isn't just a dishwashing solution; it's a separate story about care and preserving your comfort. Its composition is carefully selected to ensure the quality and moisturizing of your skin. Water, anionic surfactants, sodium chloride, amphoteric surfactants, urea, non-ionic surfactants, preservatives, sodium hydroxide, fragrance, lemon and chamomile extracts, dye - these are just a few parts of the composition that make this product truly exceptional and incredibly beneficial for you.

Krot_bottle_text: Our unparalleled product is the perfect solution for preventive cleaning of bathrooms and drainage systems. Using it at least once a month, you'll easily get rid of all the inconveniences related to clogging in pipes, traps, and drainage systems. Our unique product effortlessly removes food residues, hair, and even grease deposits, allowing you to forget about unpleasant odors and microbes. Its antibacterial properties ensure the safety and freshness of your space.
Krot_granuli_text: Our unparalleled product is the perfect solution for preventive cleaning of bathrooms and drainage systems. By using it at least once a month, you'll easily eliminate all inconveniences associated with clogging in pipes, traps, and drainage systems. Our unique product effortlessly removes food residues, hair, and even grease deposits, allowing you to forget about unpleasant odors and microbes. Its antibacterial properties ensure the safety and freshness of your space.
Bilizna_text: Our product is the perfect solution for stain removal and whitening of white cotton and linen fabrics. Additionally, it's ideal for washing and sanitary treatment of enameled, porcelain, and faience dishes, wall tiles, plastic, toilets, and trash bins. Our unique product ensures unparalleled cleanliness and shine, keeping your items and surfaces flawless and hygienically clean.
Bilizna_consentrat_text: Our product is the ideal solution for removing stains and whitening white fabrics made of cotton and linen. Additionally, it's perfect for washing and hygienic treatment of enameled, porcelain, and faience dishes, wall tiles, plastic, toilets, and trash bins. Our unique product ensures unmatched cleanliness and shine, keeping your items and surfaces flawless and hygienically clean.
Conditioner_blue_text: Our laundry conditioner is more than just a promise of softness and a charming scent. It works masterfully in multiple ways: making fabrics incredibly soft, imparting a pleasant long-lasting fragrance thanks to special perfumed pearls in the formula, easing the ironing process, and endowing laundry with an anti-static effect. Enjoy the feeling of freshness and the appearance as if your favorite laundry was drying under the deep blue summer sky, courtesy of our conditioner. It's designed to make your laundry look and stay appealing and comfortable for a long time.
Conditioner_pink_text: Our laundry conditioner is more than just a promise of softness and a charming scent. Cosolinos_text: Cosolinos is the ideal solution for washing and sanitizing enamel, porcelain, faience dishes, wall tiles, plastic, toilets, and trash cans. Our unique product ensures unparalleled cleanliness and shine, keeping your items and surfaces impeccably clean and hygienically clean.
Washing_powder_cosolino_text: Cosolinos Laundry Powder is designed for those who value cleanliness, comfort, and care for their loved ones. It effectively tackles even the toughest stains, gently cleans fabrics, preserving their color and structure. Thanks to its hypoallergenic composition, the powder is suitable for use even in families with sensitive skin or young children. Cosolinos works effectively at different temperatures, making it suitable for both hand and machine washing. Its eco-friendly formula is not only safe for people but also contributes to environmental protection, as all components easily decompose naturally. With Cosolinos, your clothes will always be impeccably clean, soft, and pleasant to the touch, and the fresh scent will provide a sense of comfort for a long time.
Window_soap_text: A state-of-the-art, highly effective cleanser for baths, including acrylic and plastic, sinks, sanitaryware, tiles, glass, and other hard, acid-resistant surfaces. Quickly and easily removes limescale deposits, hard water stains, old soap scum, and rust. It doesn’t contain harsh abrasive particles, ensuring gentle cleaning without damaging the surface. Special nanotechnology polishes and provides a streak-free shine. Creates a protective layer that repels dirt and water, preventing quick re-soiling and making subsequent cleaning easier. Contains anti-corrosive components and doesn’t produce unpleasant vapors.
Window_soap_stok_text: A state-of-the-art, highly effective cleanser for baths, including acrylic and plastic, sinks, sanitaryware, tiles, glass, and other hard, acid-resistant surfaces. Quickly and easily removes limescale deposits, hard water stains, old soap scum, and rust. It doesn’t contain harsh abrasive particles, ensuring gentle cleaning without damaging the surface. Special nanotechnology polishes and provides a streak-free shine. Creates a protective layer that repels dirt and water, preventing quick re-soiling and making subsequent cleaning easier. Contains anti-corrosive components and doesn’t produce unpleasant vapors.
Washing_powder_color_text: Extra Color Laundry Detergent is an economical and effective laundry solution suitable for all types of washing machines. It features a color protection system and does not contain environmentally harmful phosphates or zeolites, safeguarding the washing machine from limescale buildup. This detergent effectively protects colors and efficiently rinses out. Extra Color Laundry Detergent is a contemporary formula that efficiently removes stains from all fabric types. Its special color protection system prolongs the vibrancy of colors. This detergent is perfect for consumers seeking a product that effectively removes stains and preserves vibrant colors on bright fabrics for an extended period. It's a versatile product that dissolves well in water and doesn't leave residue in the washing machine drawer. Effective washing at low temperatures! Extra Color Laundry Detergent effectively cleans at 20°C! This allows for stain and dirt removal even during short washing cycles in all types of washing machines. Additionally, the detergent has been enriched with a special limescale-fighting agent, prolonging the washing machine's lifespan by preventing heating element issues caused by hard water. Its modern formula doesn't contain harmful phosphates or zeolites, components that are biologically difficult to break down and negatively impact the biodiversity of rivers and lakes. Therefore, it's recommended for environmentally conscious buyers. Extra Color Laundry Detergent is effective at an affordable price. Its good solubility and color protection are benefits you'll appreciate. Extra Color Laundry Detergent features: effective at 20°C, color protection system, guards the washing machine against limescale, high quality at an affordable price, removes dirt and stains.
Washing_powder_universal_text: Extra UNIVERSAL Laundry Detergent is an economical and effective laundry solution suitable for all types of washing machines. It features a color protection system and does not contain environmentally harmful phosphates or zeolites, safeguarding the washing machine from limescale buildup. This detergent effectively protects colors and efficiently rinses out. Extra UNIVERSAL Laundry Detergent is a contemporary formula that efficiently removes stains from all fabric types. Its special color protection system prolongs the vibrancy of colors. This detergent is perfect for consumers seeking a product that effectively removes stains and preserves vibrant colors on bright fabrics for an extended period. It's a versatile product that dissolves well in water and doesn't leave residue in the washing machine drawer. Effective washing at low temperatures! Extra UNIVERSAL Laundry Detergent effectively cleans at 20°C! This allows for stain and dirt removal even during short washing cycles in all types of washing machines. Additionally, the detergent has been enriched with a special limescale-fighting agent, prolonging the washing machine's lifespan by preventing heating element issues caused by hard water. Its modern formula doesn't contain harmful phosphates or zeolites, components that are biologically difficult to break down and negatively impact the biodiversity of rivers and lakes. Therefore, it's recommended for environmentally conscious buyers. Extra UNIVERSAL Laundry Detergent is effective at an affordable price. Its good solubility and color protection are benefits you'll appreciate. Extra UNIVERSAL Laundry Detergent features: effective at 20°C, color protection system, guards the washing machine against limescale, high quality at an affordable price, removes dirt and stains.
Washing_powder_soda_text: Calcined soda, a white powder, has a wide range of applications in industry and household use. It's a powerful cleaning agent for kitchen surfaces (stoves, sinks, countertops, food preparation areas, pots) and bathrooms (bathtubs, sinks, shelves for shampoos, cosmetics). It's used for dishwashing, especially for porcelain, faience, and enamelware, as well as for handwashing - reducing water hardness, enhancing the whiteness of clothing, and improving the effectiveness of detergents during machine washing.
Toilet_gel_green: Toilet Cleaning Gel with a Sea Breeze Scent
Toilet_gel_green_text: Bleaching and cleaning gel for toilets based on chlorine. Ideal for bathrooms, sinks, tiles, and other acid-resistant surfaces. The special sodium hypochlorite provides a sparkling shine and excellent bleaching. Effectively removes mold and fungus, preventing their appearance, and has disinfectant properties. Creates a protective layer on the surface, preventing deposits and facilitating subsequent cleaning. The gel's thick formula increases the interaction time with the surface for effective dirt removal. This is an economical and user-friendly product, entirely safe for people and the environment. 'Extra-platinum' - cleanliness and shine in every 750-gram bottle.
Toilet_gel_red: Toilet Cleaning Gel with Pine Scent
Toilet_gel_red_text: Bleaching and cleaning gel for toilets based on chlorine. Ideal for bathrooms, sinks, tiles, and other acid-resistant surfaces. The special sodium hypochlorite provides a sparkling shine and excellent bleaching. Effectively removes mold and fungus, preventing their appearance, and has disinfectant properties. Creates a protective layer on the surface, preventing deposits and facilitating subsequent cleaning. The gel's thick formula increases the interaction time with the surface for effective dirt removal. This is an economical and user-friendly product, entirely safe for people and the environment. 'Extra-platinum' - cleanliness and shine in every 750-gram bottle.
Parchment_text: Baking parchment is an ideal solution to prevent dough from sticking to the baking sheet or tray. It has a double silicone coating that ensures your baking won't stick or leave marks on surfaces. The variety of sizes and options offered add convenience, perfectly suitable for any baking sheet or oven.
Diplomat_text: Immerse yourself in the world of elegance and charm with the toilet water "Diplomat." This unique fragrance embodies sophistication and luxury, making every moment special. Fragrance notes: "Diplomat" opens with fresh citrus notes, complemented by sensual chords of exotic flowers in the heart, and concludes with warm and lasting notes of wood and musk. This combination creates a unique bouquet that impresses with its uniqueness. Why choose "Diplomat": Elegance: The "Diplomat" fragrance embodies elegance and style, adding a unique layer of charm to your image. Lasting effect: The intensity of the fragrance ensures a lasting effect, giving you a feeling of freshness and comfort throughout the day. Ideal gift: "Diplomat" is the perfect gift for those who appreciate quality and unmatched style.
For_man_text: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of masculinity and sophistication with the toilet water "For Men." This unique fragrance is distinguished by pronounced strength and luxury, making every moment special for the modern man. Fragrance notes: "For Men" opens with sparkling notes of citrus, complemented by sensual chords of exotic flowers in the heart, and concludes with warm and lasting notes of wood and musk. This combination creates a unique bouquet that impresses with its uniqueness.
